section.title: Our Journey to AI Excellence
section.subtitle: Company Story
section.description: From a vision in 2019 to becoming Dubai's leading AI communication platform, discover how we're transforming business communications across the UAE.

timeline.title: Foundation in Dubai
timeline.description: Established with a mission to revolutionize business communications in the UAE market.

timeline.title: AI Technology Development
timeline.description: Developed our first AI-powered call center solution with Arabic language support.

timeline.title: TRA Compliance Achievement
timeline.description: Achieved full UAE Telecommunications Regulatory Authority compliance and certifications.

timeline.title: DIFC Partnership
timeline.description: Became the preferred AI communication partner for Dubai International Financial Centre businesses.

timeline.title: Regional Expansion
timeline.description: Expanded services across GCC countries while maintaining Dubai headquarters.

timeline.title: AI Innovation Award
timeline.description: Recognized as 'Best AI Innovation' by Dubai Chamber of Commerce for business excellence.

mission: To empower every Dubai business with intelligent communication solutions that drive growth, enhance customer satisfaction, and maintain the highest standards of excellence.
vision: To be the Middle East's leading AI communication platform, setting the global standard for culturally-aware business intelligence.
